Hello, I'm Jhona. I like building websites.

Coming from traditional engineering, I'm now starting my journey as a self-starting aspiring front-end developer. I stand for quality and enjoy solving problems.

I like working in a team. After all, great ideas don't come from lone geniuses. I'm naturally curious and like digging through my stuff.
